bugReportStructure.Summary: In this field you need to briefly state the essence of the bug
bugReportStructure.Description: A broader description of the essence of the bug, if necessary
bugReportStructure.Steps To Reproduce: Descriptions of the Steps for reproduction
bugReportStructure.Actual Result: Indicate what works wrong, at what place in the product and under what conditions
bugReportStructure.Expected Result: How exactly the system should work according to the documentation or the opinion of the tester
bugReportStructure.Attachments: Attach files to bug reports, such as screenshots, videos, or log files
bugReportStructure.Environment: Indicates on which platform this defect is reproduced
